name: Search & Research
description: A2A agents for web search, RAG pipelines, deep research, and information retrieval.

agentNotes.langgraph-research-agent: LangGraph multi-agent system with Gemini for comprehensive web research
agentNotes.research-agent: PydanticAI agent conducting deep research with multi-source synthesis
agentNotes.mastervolt-deep-research: Sophisticated orchestration system with semantic memory for verified research
agentNotes.agentic-rag-a2a-mcp: Unified RAG system with document processing and intelligent delegation
agentNotes.leaprag: Open-source RAG platform building context-aware, auto-discoverable agents
